name: Horsemanager
author: Olland.biz

sections.description:
If you are a member at Horsemanager and you have the API license you can use this plugin to show your horses from the App on your WordPress Website. To use this plugin you will need to have an API username and password. If you do not know how to gain your API username and password you can contact Horsemanager. They will explain you how to get your username and password.
More information about Horsemanager can be found at www.horsemanager.nl
Note: Horsemanger saves all data from the API (Horse details, image url’s and video’s url’s) to your own database. This means it will take up some storage on your own server.
sections.installation:
1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  2. In the admin menu under the menu item Horsemanager fill in your API username and password and press “Save”. This will start an update saving all your horses in your own database.
  3. Create a new page and use [horsemanager] as shortcode to display the horses on that page.
  4. Finally you can visit the page you created on your website displaying all your horses.
sections.faq:
How can I get access to the API

You can contact Horsemanager for in debt details about your API

How can I use filters

There are 2 filters available categories and featured
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First version with videos and images from horses.

1.1

  • Now updates automatically the horses when changed in horsemanager, better styling and more responsive.

1.1.1

  • Hotfix whitelisted db variables

1.1.2

  • Fix for images and categories

1.1.3

  • Featured option to shortcode

short_description: This plugin allows members from Horsemanager to add their horses on their website using the Horsemanager API.
